column4: Why does network manager keep asking me to unlock the Keyring for it???
because it is a system wide setting
it should remember the authorization tho, airtonix
why ?
i don't use wireless networking out of concern for security and quality of network connection
I do, because its indepensable
to my knowledge there is no way of cracking WPA2 yet, besides you can always add another layer of encryption, if you deem it unsafe
